Name: Barishal
Description: Located in the southern part of Bangladesh, known for its rivers, fertile land, and the Bay of Bengal coast.

Name: Chattogram
Description: A coastal division in southeastern Bangladesh, known for its port city, Chattogram, and beautiful beaches.

Name: Dhaka
Description: The central division of Bangladesh, home to the capital city Dhaka, the political and economic heart of the country.

Name: Khulna
Description: Located in the southwestern part of Bangladesh, known for the Sundarbans mangrove forest and the largest tiger population.

Name: Mymensingh
Description: A northern division, known for its agricultural lands and rich cultural history.

Name: Rajshahi
Description: Located in the northwestern part of Bangladesh, known for its historical sites and agricultural products, particularly mangoes.

Name: Rangpur
Description: A northwestern division, known for its rural landscapes and vibrant agricultural economy.

Name: Sylhet
Description: Located in the northeastern part of Bangladesh, known for its tea gardens, natural beauty, and significant diaspora abroad.
